events.text: (Your cellphone is ringing. You accept a call from an unknown number,)
He-Hello?  Can you hear me? You're the New Recruit for our Guild, correct?

events.question: Ahem, let me introduce myself. I'm [color=#00e5f6]Glaciela[/color], the Liutenant of the [color=green]Ouroboros[/color] guild. I'm here to assist you in your first dungeon mission. I assume you already know the [color=#ffd703]basics of combat[/color]?

events.text: That's no problem. I'll walk you through the default controls. Use [color=#ffd703]A[/color] and [color=#ffd703]D[/color] to move left and right, press [color=#ffd703]SPACE[/color] to jump and press [color=#ffd703]ENTER[/color] to use basic attacks on enemies in your facing direction.

On the top left of your screen is your Stamina Bar. You can press [color=#ffd703]SHIFT[/color] to dash backwards or in your moving direction, or press [color=#ffd703]SPACE[/color] in mid-air to double jump. Both of these actions consume stamina. Stamina regenerates over time.

Damaging and defeating enemies grant [color=aqua]Mana[/color] that you can use to cast Skills. You can see their [color=#ffd703]Elemental Weaknesses[/color] right next to their health bar. These small fries are weak to [color=silver]Physical[/color] damage, which is the damage type of your basic attacks.

I've logged my instructions to your [color=#ffd703]Cellphone[/color]'s Notes app, which you can open by pressing [color=#ffd703]U[/color] by default. Now, proceed by killing those enemies in front of you!

That's great! Now, proceed by killing those enemies in front of you. Remember, you can press [color=#ffd703]U[/color] (by default) to open your [color=#ffd703]Cellphone[/color] and read the instructions I gave you on your Notes app.
